## DataAdapter.stat() method

Retrieve metadata about the given file/folder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stat(normalizedPath: string): Promise<Stat | null>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>normalizedPath</code> | <code>string</code> | path to file/folder, use [normalizePath()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/normalizePath.md) to normalize beforehand. |

`Promise``<`[`Stat`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter/stat.md)` | null>`
